name: allow
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: allow
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to give permission for someone to do something, or to not prevent something from happening
trans_examp.trans_cn: 使有可能；允许，准许；容许

example.eg: Do you think Dad will allow you to go to Jamie's party?
example.egtrans: 你认为爸爸会允许你去参加杰米的聚会吗？

example.eg: You're not allowed to talk during the exam.
Her proposals would allow (= make it possible for) more people to stay in full-time education.
example.egtrans: 她的提议会使更多的人能够继续接受全日制教育。

example.eg: The loophole has allowed hundreds of drink-drivers to avoid prosecution.
example.egtrans: 这个法律漏洞使得数以百计的酒后驾车者钻了空子，逃避了起诉。

example.eg: The government has refused to allow foreign journalists into the area for several weeks.
example.egtrans: 该政府禁止外国记者进入这个地区已经有好几周了。

example.eg: Prisoners have been moved to allow the demolition of part of the prison.
example.egtrans: 犯人已经转移走了，以便拆除监狱的一部分。

example.eg: Pets aren't allowed in this hotel.
example.egtrans: 这个旅馆不准许将宠物带入。

example.eg: Smoking is not allowed in this restaurant.
He didn't allow us enough time to finish the test.
example.egtrans: 他没有给我们留足够的时间完成测验。

example.eg: Red Cross officials were allowed access to the prison for the first time a few days ago.
example.egtrans: 几天前，红十字会的官员首次获准进入该监狱。

example.eg: The referee decided to allow (= officially accept) the goal.
At the weekend I allow myself (= I give myself the special pleasure of having) a box of chocolates.
example.egtrans: 每逢周末我给自己开戒，吃一盒巧克力。

example.eg: How much time do you allow yourself (= make available to yourself) to get ready in the morning?
example.egtrans: 早晨你给自己留出多少时间来准备？

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a polite expression used when offering to help in some way

example.eg: You can't carry all those bags yourself - please, allow me.
example.egtrans: 那些袋子你自己拎不了——我来帮你吧。

dsense.name: allow
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to admit or agree that something is true

example.eg: She allowed that she might have been too suspicious.
example.egtrans: 她承认自己可能太多心了。
